i18n_pendant_mode_global_description.message: Applicable to all websites and pages, keeping notes permanently available on the page

i18n_pendant_mode_origin_description.message: Display only on specified domain and its subdomains, suitable for website-level note management

i18n_pendant_mode_exact_description.message: Display only when exactly matching the specified URL, ensuring precise note management

i18n_pendant_mode_prefix_description.message: Match URLs starting with the specified prefix, supporting custom prefix note management

i18n_pendant_mode_pattern_description.message: Use regular expressions for advanced URL matching, supporting complex logic note management
